short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap search engines with custom keywords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Search Engine Swap" extension allows users to quickly switch between different search engines right in your search bar.

Uses Perplexity.AI as Default Browser

Supports Custom Keywords and URLs

Enhances Workflow
